alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Rock Springs and Green River; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:08PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Locally Strong Winds this Afternoon and Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...Localized wind gusts between 45 and 60 mph possible from showers and thunderstorms. * WHERE...Fremont, Lincoln, Natrona, Sublette and Sweetwater counties. * WHEN...Through 8 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The very dry air mass at the surface could cause dry microbursts from even showers or weak thunderstorms.
